definition: to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.english: Set the debug option to enable a backtrace when a; problem occurs.
sentences.chinese: 当有问题出现显示错误信息，便于调试。

sentences.english: That situation, in a nutshell, describes the world of designing for debugging.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况，简单扼要地描述了调试设计界的情况。

sentences.english: At last node system is debugged.
sentences.chinese: 最后对节点系统进行了连机调试。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制的硬件在环试验平台对上述算法进行了调试。

sentences.english: In most cases, this module should only be used for debugging purposes.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数情况下，这个模块只是用于调试目的。

sentences.english: It's easier to debug, make valid, edit and re-engineer etc.
sentences.chinese: 这对容易调试，使有效，编辑，重新设计等等。

sentences.english: The adult must help children debug "KUPAO" when they use it for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 大人必须帮助孩子在第一次使用前调试好酷步。

sentences.english: There are paper and plastic production line of the company installation and commissioning work.
sentences.chinese: 还有本公司纸塑生产线的安装调试工作。

sentences.english: For remote-workbench debugging, you won't need to specify a project.
sentences.chinese: 对于远程工作台调试，您无须指定项目。

sentences.english: Why does my 4D Database debugger not display all panels?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我的4D数据库调试器不显示所有板吗？

sentences.english: You have to check the logs for debugging.
sentences.chinese: 为了进行调试，必须查看日志。

sentences.english: This assembly language output listing is useful as a debugging aid.
sentences.chinese: 这种汇编语言输出表是支持调试的有用工具。

sentences.english: Debugging flags can be pretty useful.
sentences.chinese: 调试标记可能会非常有用。
关于调试我们来说几句。

sentences.english: The author adds some new code to the basic KIVA-3V program and makes compilation of it.
sentences.chinese: 在源程序基础上，添加了程序代码并进行了调试。

definition: to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
to troubleshoot/to check components individually for problems/troubleshooting
debugging and commissioning/testing (of a whole system)
